short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the best deals on Walmart products with Walmart Deals Finder. Save money on your purchases with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to easily access Walmart's Value of the Day and the newest Walmart deals. To view a list of the deals, simply click on the extension button.
